hints.batchCreate: A bot will be created for each market (symbol + interval). Skipped if the wallet already has a bot in that market.
hints.intervalFirst: Select interval first, then choose a matching strategy
hints.strategyFiltered: Only strategies with the selected interval are shown
hints.symbolsOptional: Leave empty to create bots for all symbols

messages.resultSkipped: {count} bot(s) skipped (wallet already has a bot in those markets).
